game.title: The Long Lost Crown
game.objective: Retrieve the crown of the ancient king
game.description: The Long Lost Crown is a legendary artifact said to possess immense power. Many have sought after it, but none have successfully retrieved it. You have been chosen as the worthy hero to embark on this epic quest. Your objective is to locate and retrieve the crown from the forgotten ruins of the ancient kingdom. Beware of the treacherous traps and fierce guardians that protect the crown.
game.reward: The crown is said to grant the wearer extraordinary abilities and unparalleled power.

tasks.description: To begin your journey, you must first find the ancient map that leads to the location of the hidden ruins. The map is said to be hidden within the library of the ancient monastery on the outskirts of the kingdom.

tasks.objective: Solve the riddle of the guardians
tasks.description: Once you have the map, it will guide you to the hidden entrance of the ruins. However, the entrance is guarded by riddles that must be solved in order to gain access. Use your wit and knowledge to unravel the mysteries and unlock the path to the crown.

Inside the ruins lies a labyrinth filled with deadly traps and dangerous creatures. You must navigate through the treacherous maze, avoiding traps and defeating any adversaries that stand in your way. Only the bravest and most skilled adventurers will survive.

tasks.objective: Confront the Guardian of the Crown
tasks.description: At the heart of the ruins, you will encounter the powerful Guardian of the Crown. This ancient being will challenge you in combat, testing your skills and determination. Defeat the guardian to claim the crown as your own.
